sections.about: Hi! My names Aaron and I'm a Calgary based software developer / engineering student / guitar teacher. From an early age, my passion for engineering new things has been a driving force. Immersed in the world of coding, I crafted my skills and discovered innovative solutions. I'm currently studying Mechanical Engineering at the University of Calgary
sections.projects: Here's some projects I've worked on, ranging from AI to Web Development.
sections.experience: Here's some of my past experiences.

experiences.title: Guitar Teacher
d: Taught 20+ students how to play guitar, musical concepts, and how to enhance their ability through specific techniques and improvisation
Provided feedback to students through patient and collaborative discussion

experiences.title: Research Fellow, Project Manager
d: Researched and built 5+ projects related to AI, quantum computing and brain computer interfaces.
Participated in winning hackathons (3x) and consultation challenges (2x) with Google and Microsoft, acting as project manager to organize group work

experiences.title: Software Dev
d: Worked on a collective software project using frontend and backend development
Implemented agile methodology to streamline development cycles.

experiences.title: High School Diploma
d: Senior Football Team, Captain of Senior Rugby Team

projects.title: PrecisionFit
projects.d: An AI-driven personal trainer application using computer vision and neural networks.
projects.exd: Computer webcam analyses workout data, outputting accuracy metrics to help improve exercise form.

projects.title: Should boxing and MMA fans look to AI as judges?
projects.d: An article describing the viability of implementing computer vision and artificial intelligence technology as combat sport judges.

projects.title: NestUp
projects.d: Nestup is the newest sensation in the world of social media, offering a fresh, feature-rich platform for sharing life's special moments.
projects.exd: Drawing inspiration from the visual appeal of Instagram, Nestup takes your social experience to a new level, offering a space where friends and communities can come together to engage and connect.

projects.title: Inspire
projects.d: Inspire is a social media platform designed to uplift and motivate users through positive and inspirational content.
projects.exd: With a focus on spreading encouragement and fostering personal growth, Inspire aims to create a supportive online community where users can connect and learn about inspiring stories, quotes, movies, albums, and much, much more.

projects.title: Xenovation Labs
projects.d: An article proposing a solution to microplastics disrupting the marine environment, through Xenovation Labs, which utilizes micro Xenobots to autonomously collect microplastics for recovery.
projects.exd: The article proposes a step by step process towawrds recovering microplastics, including the usage of apps, USV's. The science behind xenobots and microplastics are explored.

projects.title: Connect Four AI
projects.d: An autonomous, unbeatable connect four AI utilizing the minimax algorithm.
projects.exd: This repo also includes an arduino option, allowing for the AI to be implemented on a real-life circuit.
